title: How to get unbanned on Overcast?

replies.body:
It may be because he's using a VPN that other banned players are using, or because he actually evaded. In evasion cases, those are quite difficult to prove innocence.

Just have him be honest. If he isn't honest, his frame of appeal is completely gone. The last thing they like to do is appeal liars and cheaters.
